task.summary: fixed broken routes in application controller
SessionsController authenticates for Facebook & Twitter and assigns user if one exists; developer log in by-pass if rails.env == developer; Stubbed UsersController
EventsController ensure_registered instead of just authenticated; UsersController ensures_authenticated for destroy & edit;
